column5: Do you have a degree or professional background in construction? Are you keen to develop and expand your career with a Masters in construction management?Our MSc Construction Project Management course is designed to support your professional development and provide you with the knowledge and skills you need to succeed in today’s globalised and ever-changing construction industry.Course detail & modulesAs a construction project manager you will learn to handle the planning, coordination, and successful execution of construction projects. The projects you work on could range from agricultural, residential, commercial, institutional, industrial, civil, or environmental.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
